We need to change the draconian immigration laws that place an undue burden on our communities. We must pass the New Way Forward Act to roll back policies that result in racial profiling, disproportionate incarceration, deportation, and the separation of immigrant families.

The conservative Justices have now decided that a clerical error and paperwork mistake is reason enough to expel his entire family permanently from the country. This exemplifies why we need to fix our broken immigration system.
When federal courts said they had no jurisdiction to review mistakes like this, our legal system failed Mr. Patel and the case ended up in front of the Supreme Court.

üßµToday‚Äôs decision on immigration by SCOTUS is cruel. Mr. Patel spent decades in the U.S. as a permanent resident, but now faces deportation for simply checking the wrong box on a driver‚Äôs license renewal application. We need to fix this broken system. https://t.co/tnTt3wkrY2
